name: GENESEE & WYOMING INC
sampleDescriptions:
General advocacy concerning balanced regulatory environment for freight railroads

Discussions of an ideal short line rail freight grant program.
S. 1655 and HR 3353 - Transportation, Housing and Urban Development, and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2018; advocacy concerning increased truck weight and length limits.

S. 407 and HR 721 - Building Rail Access for Customers and the Economy (BRACE) Act; advocacy to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to permanently extend the railroad track maintenance credit.

S.
S. 3023 and HR 6072 - Transportation, Housing and Urban Development, and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2019; advocacy concerning increased truck weight and length limits.

S. 407 and HR 721 - Building Rail Access for Customers and the Economy (BRACE) Act; advocacy to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to permanently extend the railroad track maintenance credit.

S.
